Description.Text: City Park Hotel Bila Tserkva is a stylish 4-star property offering modern accommodation in the heart of Bila Tserkva. Highlights include a bar, free Wi-Fi, a spa with private treatment rooms and an excellent location close to the Orthodox cathedral of the Saviour's Transfiguration. Bila Tserkva is a historic city situated alongside the Ros River. Formerly an industrial hub, it has retained much of its period architecture. Nearby places of interest include the early 19th-century covered market, Alexandria Park, St Nicholas Church and the Orthodox cathedral of the Saviour's Transfiguration. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Bila Tserkva destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern low-rise building with a distinctive orange and grey facade. Facilities include a spa with three different types of saunas, a thermal treatment area and private treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Modern rooms are decorated in a simple modern style with floral murals and stylish furniture. They are situated on floors 2-3 of the hotel. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, safe and air-conditioning. The tiled en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the friendly hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
